Reviews.Title: “Huge Room but dated and a poor breakfast”

Reviews.Content: beds mine single booking clean powerful shower breakfast wasnt white toast cornflakes bad coffee staff reception werent particularly helpful checking leave key reception check key didnt question name didnt secure location price

Reviews.Title: “Good location but poor service/amenities”
Reviews.Author: Davo_NZ
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights chose pricelocation location walked via hyde park city hot cool window breakfast poor worth front desk wifi refused access ipad wifi didnt apple assessment service poor free wifi cafe corner lift surprise site

Reviews.Title: “Worth of money with excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Matias66
Reviews.Content: spent nights twins pretty adequate hotel 300 metres paddington station buses eg 23 travel via sussex gardens opposite hotel basic breakfast consisted flakes boiled egg cheese ham watery juice coffee toasts served tables clean tiny bathroom shower friendly manned reception 24h

Reviews.Content: hotelits rooming hot lift carry 3 bags third im pretty shape dont exercise dress pants shirt tie eat breakfast paid wait 15minutes hot water available water pressure water washroom floor due tub water 3 channels sad reason awaythe front desk guys solely collect passport reason useless

Reviews.Title: “Great location & very good value”
Reviews.Author: Musicista
Reviews.Content: 5 minutes paddington edgware rd tube stops nofrills hotel wonderful home base breakfast adequate daily front desk staff friendly helpful eating london st block cafes english breakfast ya lebanese indian travel tips oyster card tube

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good value, comfortable room and lovely staff”
Reviews.Author: Peetimu
Reviews.Content: low expectations based peoples reviews orchard proved real treat tastefully decorated comfortable warm nice little flat screen tv stones throw paddington station edgware road easy staff wonderful lovely reception charming wakeup call morning usual wake call hotels help printing urgent document sunday morning internet cafes closed definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Heidi9330
Reviews.Content: daughter arrived middle night plane delayed denmark ring doorbell receptionist straight polite 2 2 single beds looked newly renovated bathroom nice plenty hot water soap towels twice 4 nights stay hairdryer tv breakfast simple couple hours location 12 min walk madame tussauds 15 min walk oxford street 30 min walk harrods central luxery cheap clean hotel recommend orchard

Reviews.Title: “Dont even bother”

Reviews.Content: staff extremley rude helpful horrible breakfast joke lined 25 mins dont tables amount guest offered cornflakes english exact words hello morning rude staff werent afraid yell didnt respond straight english breakfast wouldnt fill 3 orange juice tasted bleach aloud glass hotel manager demeaning rude lady idea managed job considering customer service skills

Reviews.Title: “Adequate at the price.”
Reviews.Author: Loz97
Reviews.Content: trying hotel london reasonable standard reasonable price soul destroying task looked major budget chains £100 night reading reviews site internet alighted orchard appears huge variation price various sites try paid £60 single hotel clean kept welcome reception warm explained actually double perfectly serviceable shower arrived night’s sleep beware minimalist little walk bed awkward lot luggage shower clean newly refurbished plenty hot water frills shampoo tea coffee shelf toothbrush bed comfy bed linen clean price range believe sweltering night faced window sussex gardens pleasant street lined hotels short stroll edgware road mix ethnic restaurants shops acceptable pub opposite beware closes 11 pm rare days uk paddington station close marylebone breakfast can’t comment reviewers didn’t miss breakfast class train that’s story

Reviews.Title: “Didnt expect much. Didnt get much”
Reviews.Author: herbie_gump84
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nites june 3 nites london wasnt read reviews left prepared avoided breakfast ate cafe nice arrived guy reception nice welcoming sent 101 nice sized double bed 1 single ensuite sized bathroom fine left hand key lady whom suspect mother family shouting reception demon returned hotel key grilling lady handed key nice person anyway walls paper loud noise times nite generator heat wave windows impossible stay location wise perfect close restaurants bars tube price perfect

Reviews.Title: “Never again!”
Reviews.Author: Anna1983Turku
Reviews.Content: hotel super simple bathroom towels soap else minibar safety box mugs glasses air conditioning single bed separated wider sleep quilts blankets pictures teddy bears cute hotel breakfast worst continental breakfast meant brought cup cereals else husband english breakfast consisted egg beans strip bacon toasts horrible morning nearby internet cafe booked ourselves hotel check staff rude insisted pay entire 5 nights reservation stayed night cancelled reservation via internet claimed internet company wed pay hole time debate paying nights 170 € cancellation fee 85 € luckily hotel enjoy rest stay london

Reviews.Title: “Clean, value for money - excellent staff and service”
Reviews.Author: manfromstaffs
Reviews.Content: thank orchard hotel fab breakfast served speed smile 24 hour reception free parking warm radiators yes simple simple tiny bathroom kettle paid peanuts basic facilites required honest location tip top youd stupid stay hotel ill search ive found hotel using time stay london
